analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
analyzed: dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgataḥ puggalaḥ yathābhatam nikkhittaḥ evam niraye

original: Pāpakena ca sīlena, pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā.
analyzed: pāpakena ca sīlena pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā

original: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye”ti.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave dvīhi dhammehi samannāgataḥ puggalaḥ yathābhatam nikkhittaḥ evam niraye ti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
